title: cmd/gc: 'internal compiler error: missed typecheck'
body:
by **Bond.Dmitry**: 
What steps will reproduce the problem?
1. go get -u github.com/nsf/gocode

What is the expected output?
Getting gocode successfully

What do you see instead?
C:\go>go get -u github.com/nsf/gocode
# github.com/nsf/gocode
src\pkg\github.com\nsf\gocode\declcache.go:107: internal compiler error: missed
typecheck:
.   NAME-main.req u(1) a(1) l(2897) x(0+0) class(PAUTO) ld(1) used(1)
main.file_read_request

Which compiler are you using (5g, 6g, 8g, gccgo)?
8g, 6g

Which operating system are you using?
Win7 x86-32, Ubuntu Linux 12.10 x86-32, Kubuntu 12.10 x86-64

Which version are you using?  (run 'go version')
93dc7f0e302b tip

Please provide any additional information below.
Issue was discussed here:
https://groups.google.com/forum/?fromgroups=#!topic/golang-nuts/2_IeDtNQ3oA
